unnormalised: Arre bhai, civil kaideantle he property-che zhogde kednaanchech natam zatat! Mhojea chachacho case 2005 vorsa thaun chol'ta - azun porian nirnoyachi vat polleun asa. Adv. Sharma sodanch mhonta "fuddli tarik, fuddli tarik," ani chacha vakilank chai ani samosam khatir Rs. 5000 kharch kortat. Dista asa fokot chaiwalech jinktat mhunn! Gambhirtayen sangta, taka 2030 adim puro zaunchem poddto, na zalear tachea natvank zaminichi sodo case vollagn poddtoli. LOL!
normalised: Arre bhai, civil kanoona khalchi hi propertichi zhogdim kednaach sampna ti natkam! Mhojea chacha-cho case don hazar ani panch saun chol'la – azun nirnoyachi vat pollyet. Advocate Sharma sangtat “next hearing, next hearing,” ani chacha vakilank chai ani samosa khatir panch hazar rupiya karchitat. Dista mhuntat te fakt chaiwale jinktat! Gambhirtayen chintun, taka don hazar ani tees poilim nirakaran mellum mhunn bhavartan, nam tor tachea natvank zomin bodlek case favo zatli. L-O-L!
text: Arre bhai, civil kaideantle he property-che zhogde kednaanchech natam zatat! Mhojea chachacho case 2005 vorsa thaun chol'ta - azun porian nirnoyachi vat polleun asa. Adv. Sharma sodanch mhonta "fuddli tarik, fuddli tarik," ani chacha vakilank chai ani samosam khatir Rs. 5000 kharch kortat. Dista asa fokot chaiwalech jinktat mhunn! Gambhirtayen sangta, taka 2030 adim puro zaunchem poddto, na zalear tachea natvank zaminichi sodo case vollagn poddtoli. LOL!
